gmd:metadataStandardName.gco:CharacterString: North American Profile of ISO19115:2003 - Geographic information - Metadata

gmd:description.gco:CharacterString: Secure Web-based application by which registered individuals affiliated with organizations that are members of a Data Exchange administered by Land Information Ontario can order data sets to which they have appropriate access permission. Upon ordering the data sets are either prepared for download, and notice sent to requestor, or packaged and distributed offline.

gmd:contactInstructions.gco:CharacterString: If you are not a member of a Data Exchange, please contact Land Information Ontario Information Access unit by email at lio@ontario.ca or by telephone at 705-755-1878.

gmd:abstract.gco:CharacterString: A Nesting Site is a point feature that identifies the location of one or more nests that belong to a particular species. This Series is a single, physical collection of data representing an aggregation of discrete Nesting Site Datasets for each of the 26 Ontario Ministry of Natural Resources District.

textGroup.LocalisedCharacterString: Un site de nidification est un objet ponctuel qui identifie la localisation d’un ou plusieurs nids qui appartiennent à une espèce particulière. Cette série est une collection physique de données unique qui représente un agrégat de jeux de données discret sur les sites de nidification pour chacun des 26 districts du ministère des Richesses naturelles de l’Ontario.

gmd:purpose.gco:CharacterString: To identify the location and types of Nesting Sites for wildlife management purposes in support of resource extraction, development, emergency response, and recreation planning activities.

gmd:other.gco:CharacterString: Update activity determines whether existing nests are still in good repair, are in use, are occupied by the same species, are occupied by the same birds. Update activity also establishes values for attributes of new features.

gmd:maintenanceNote.gco:CharacterString: Nests unoccupied for 5 years or more leads to Feature instance being "frozen" (not included for analysis or display).

gmd:other.gco:CharacterString: Update activity locates and identifies new nests.

gmd:maintenanceNote.gco:CharacterString: Nests unoccupied for 5 years or more leads to Feature instance being "frozen" (not included for analysis or display, status Not Active).

gmd:fileDescription.gco:CharacterString: Display created in ArcIMS using OMNR Base Data classes (eg roads, water features, utility corridors, treed areas, etc) as context for this point data set.

gmd:title.gco:CharacterString: Ontario Ministry of Natural Resources (OMNR) Thesaurus

gmd:edition.gco:CharacterString: Originally created to catalogue documents stored in the OMNR library and since modified

gmd:title.gco:CharacterString: Ontario Ministry of Natural Resources (OMNR) Thesaurus

gmd:edition.gco:CharacterString: Originally created to catalogue documents stored in the OMNR library and since modified.

gmd:title.gco:CharacterString: Ontario Ministry of Natural Resources (OMNR) Thesaurus

gmd:edition.gco:CharacterString: Originally created to catalogue documents stored in the OMNR library and since modified.

gmd:useLimitation.gco:CharacterString: This information holding is not to be used for Legal Purposes.

Statutory: This Information holding is to be used only for the purposes for which it was collected. Use must be in accordance with the terms of the licence issued by the Ontario Ministry of Natural Resources.

Sensitivity: Although generally available to the public, some of the information in this information holding may be considered sensitive and, as such, access to the holding may, in whole or in part, be restricted to authorized individuals and/or organizations in accordance with the Ontario Rare and Endangered Species Act 2003. For more information, see Selected Wildlife and Habitat Features - Inventory Manual, W. B. Ranta, Kenora District, Section 2.2d. A list of authorized users is available from the Ontario Ministry of Natural Resources (OMNR) Information Access unit.
Privacy: There are no known privacy concerns in this information holding.

gmd:environmentDescription.gco:CharacterString: Spatial locations and attributes are maintained by the OMNR's Natural Resources Values Information System (NRVIS), a custom instance of ESRI ArcGIS 9.x supported by Oracle DBMS

gmd:organisationName.gco:CharacterString: Ontario Ministry of Natural Resources - Land Information Ontario

gmd:abstract.gco:CharacterString: This Service comprises a subset of Geospatial data classes stored in the Ontario Land Information Warehouse related to wildlife habitat for several species in Ontario such as feeding areas, breeding areas, calving areas and nesting sites. It is available for use as an OGC-compliant Web Map Service (WMS).

textGroup.LocalisedCharacterString: Ce service inclut un sous-ensemble de classes de données géospatiales emmagasinées dans l’entrepôt d’information sur les terres de l’Ontario associé aux habitats de la faune de plusieurs espèces en Ontario tels que les aires d’alimentation, les aires de reproduction, les aires de mise bas et les sites de nidification. Il est aussi disponible pour être utilisé en tant que service des cartes Web (SCW) conforme à l’OGC.

gmd:title.gco:CharacterString: Standard NRVIS Interchange Format (SNIF) Report - 'Nesting Site'

gmd:description.gco:CharacterString: Detailed description of data dictionary and data model.

gmd:statement.gco:CharacterString: Data is collected and maintained by Ontario Ministry of Natural Resources (OMNR) Districts using the Natural Resources Values Information System (NRVIS).

gmd:description.gco:CharacterString: Investigation by OMNR staff biologists via GPS and remote GIS devices both on the ground and by helicopter.
online; direct collection by Ontario Ministry of Natural Resources (OMNR) biologists via GPS
hardcopyTracedPaper; direct collection by Ontario Ministry of Natural Resources (OMNR) biologists via observations

gmd:other.gco:CharacterString: Update activity checks for changes to any aspect of the dataset and modifies the Metadata record accordingly.
